description: does what you want it to do....mostly :>
There is not much to complain about. It does its job really well, the interface is intuitive and the team behind it keeps adding new features.
Since file dialog bug was solved it works great!

Greatware! Looking forward to v2.5. Very little thought involved setting up my E3 Pro. Changed the size nozzle to 0.8mm left the defaults and got a great print my 1st go. Other reviews, I would have to say are biased. I did try Cura 1st failed 3 times and it took too much thought to try to get it to print in the middle of the bed. (that should be an easy fix. Still not sure what needs to be done to center it. This was after I checked the box..) Probably won't waste anymore time on it. Actually I will be uninstalling it after posting this.
summary: Super easy! Intuitive interface! I'm not an employee or a shill!

description: Works better fthan Slic3r
Great to it packaged on Fedora, it replaced CURA for me.
It's my favorite slicer.

Prusa Slicer is one of the best Slicers that you can get at this moment in time. This is great as it is completely open source and free and in constant development. At the time of writing the dev team are working custom supports which has only been available to people who have paid for Simplify3D, which proves how FOSS software can be just as or better that payed.
summary: Great Slicer, Would Recommend to Anyone

description: Works great. Is a great app for all printers either from prusa or running marlin
One of the best slicers that you can get.
I already like it much more than Cura, and the fact that this application has been packed and is compatible with Fedora thanks to flathub is just another added bonus!
works well, no complaints.
Crashes when trying to import config or anything that opens file dialog.
summary: Crashes when trying to access file system

description: Crashes when trying to import config or anything that opens file dialog.
summary: Crashes when trying to import stl-file or any other

description: The program itself working so far, didn't experience those crashes as the others, only when I'm trying to close the program. 4* for this reason, but it's absolutely usable for me
very good but crashes if gcode is saved to ssd hope this will get fixed soon, otherwise works very good
Prusa Slicer itself is good, but the most recent version (spring 2021) freezes after exporting gcode, annoying.
Everythings work fine for me until when I try to export to g-code, suddenly, it will close.
Works wonderfull with my Prusa Printer! I love my Prusa printer and with this software it runs like a deam. Thanks!
summary: works wonderfull with my Prusa Printer

description: very good software, works like expected

It is possible that the program files were infected via another installation, but clamscan found Unix.Trojan.Generic-9919438-0 inside of the file system. I would be very wary of installing this in your machine.
summary: Clamscan found a Trojan in the file system

description: But that was about all it did fine, after i got through setting up all of my printers info, stats, limits, model, retraction list goes on... i load my stl and slice it. It proceeded to jump to about 79% immediately, and stall. So i opened the monitor and my cpu was maxed out. So i walked away and came back and it had finished the slice perfectly with my settings... Very excited at this point i exported it to a file and moved it to an sd card... My printer freaked out, the temps were way wrong, the z axis started going to max for no reason like it was returning home for no reason... i thought maybe it would stop and turn back it didn't so i pressed stop print, Nothing kept climbing so i had to flip the kill switch on the power supply. Not a good idea ever especially on a hot printer... so i immediately turn it back on and set the fans manually to max too cool down... ill just go back to cura now... NO THANK YOU PRUSA... really got my hopes up with this one...
finally an easy Ubuntu installation of Prusa Slic3r. Thank you
best free slicer on the market
summary: best free slicer on the market

description: Finally I have an icon I can use in my sidebar.
It's easy enough to pick up and play with. I also like that is faster than at loading and generating G-Code.
Very good program, but there is a new version out (2.3.0) since a few month. It is not actual. Now I use AppImage to use new features.
Kann alles was ich zum 3d Drucken benötige und liefert super Ergebnisse und das alles Open Source. Was will man mehr?
Bitte Behaltet den Linux Support bei, Danke !
Leider stürzt die SNAP-Variante beim Auswerfen einer SD-Karte ab :(

I used the new release for some 3D model printing. Fast generation with nice additions by setting break points e.g. integrating nuts or magnets with the model. Unfortunatley the display of the MK3S MMU didn't displayed the string added to this break point.
Otherwise it is a stable a nice working slicer.
Keep on improving the tool.
Simple d'utilisation et rapide, on peut l'utiliser avec les réglages par défaut mais aussi en mode expert.
Programme adapté pour une imprimante 3D Prusa.
il manque un profil pour la Flsun SR, dommage j'aurais mis 5 étoiles
L'application est simple et bien faite, je la connaissait sous windows et franchement elle fonctionne mieux sous UBUNTU
summary: Pour les pocesseur d'une Ender3 c'est genial!

description: Très simple d'utilisation en mode simple pour les débutants, et permet d'évoluer vers les modes avancé et expert. très bon logiciel

Bonne appli et j'utilise aussi Ultimaker Cura (de moins en moins)

Je n'ai pas mis 5 dû à la prise de tête que j'ai eu pour la mise à jour du firmware de l'imprimante. Tous avais l'air de bien se passé et cela ne fonctionné pas. Toutes les permission étant donné. Fini par passé en mode console pour voir que c'était bien une permission non accordé. en passant par sudo j'ai pu mettre à jour le firmware.

Il y a aussi 
Internal error: execve failed: Permission denied
lorsque je veux éjecter la carte SD après l'enregistrement du Gcode. Il faut que je passe par le gestionnaire de fichier, dommage.
summary: Bonne appli, qui a du potentiel

description: Этой программе пока не удалось обогнать по функционалу Cura, но она обогнала Куру наперед в плане понятности, удобства, интуитивной простоты. Gcode делает хорошего качества. Если у вас один принтер и не требуется печать переменным слоем разной ширины, то Пруши хватит с головой. Я чуток с профилями для пары принтеров напутал, но в остальном способен разобраться и школьник (проверено), при том, что функционала предостаточно. Порадовала поддержка smoothieware-gcode, не у всех слайсеров она была.

Программа пришла на смену Slic3r, которая частенько подвисала. Пользоваться текущей версией - одно удовольствие, за полгода зависаний пока не замечено.
Адекватно реагирует на тонкие настройки.
После обновления на версию 2.3.3 левая часть окна, где отображается модель и нарезка пропали. Белый фон.
